Articles.Content:
I wouldn't expect an official release before 1.1

Judging from what I've seen I think it'll be out soon after seeing most textures and such are done.
I am reggie for this!

[quote name='sp1989']I wouldn't expect an official release before 1.1[/QUOTE]
1.1 isn't going to affect models as much as it will plugins.
I'm still waiting for 1.1. My 64bit hack doesn't work. :(
Any updates?

If you send me centrifuge modules in something 3ds Max can read then I'll make the windows much closer to what we can see in the movie for you.
Here's what we can see in the movie:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EttVbFA.png[/img]
And here's your one:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S3qJZDs.png[/IMG]
As you can see, the areas between the windows should have constant width.

[B]BananaIsAFruit [/B]Not much, got a few more textures done. Lots of school work during these weeks, more real life = less work time XD

[B]sashan[/B] I plan on remaking the whole thing since the one I made is too simple

wip pics

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uIjyaX2.png[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KFOZ4k9.png[/IMG] Edited November 20, 2015 by xxhansonmaxx

[quote name='xxhansonmaxx'][B]BananaIsAFruit [/B]Not much, got a few more textures done. Lots of school work during these weeks, more real life = less work time XD

[B]sashan[/B] I plan on remaking the whole thing since the one I made is too simple

wip pics

[url]http://i.imgur.com/uIjyaX2.png[/url][url]http://i.imgur.com/KFOZ4k9.png[/url][/QUOTE]
what do you mean for remaking the whole thing? Texture or models? For the screenshots you released this mod looked quite stockalike, as well as the Descent Veichle.
He means the centrifuge / crew quarters module, I believe. It's not "quite" accurate to the film. The biggest difference to me is the width of the windows. Three large, two small.

[quote name='xxhansonmaxx'][B]BananaIsAFruit [/B]Not much, got a few more textures done. Lots of school work during these weeks, more real life = less work time XD

[B]sashan[/B] I plan on remaking the whole thing since the one I made is too simple[/QUOTE]

Keep up with the school work. Being at school is the equivalent of employment as it you investing your own time (more valuable than money) in your future.

I quite like the simplistic style of the rotating hab that you have designed already. There is always going to be a balance between photo realism and what is achievable in KSP. Whilst 'busyness' in design and texture can be awesome don't knock the KISS principle. Many good artists don't keep adding to the work but rather know when adding further touches will detract from the final form of their masterpiece.

Peace.

Could we get a list of all what needs to be done before you release ?
Would be nice because the hype is crazy !!!

If you need any parts for structural reinforcement, I could design some heavy-duty struts. Whenever I did a Hermes-like build, a recurring problem for me was that the entire ship kept wobbling and nearly broke apart every time I tried to maneuver. Edited November 21, 2015 by njmksr
is there a stream tonight?

sorry no stream today

[B]NateDaBeast[/B] modeling, texturing, unity'ing, cfg'ing... the usual stuff

[B]njmksr[/B] I'm not sure, I'd have to test the parts in game to see what kind of wobble it gets

[quote name='xxhansonmaxx']sorry no stream today

[B]NateDaBeast[/B] modeling, texturing, unity'ing, cfg'ing... the usual stuff

[B]njmksr[/B] I'm not sure, I'd have to test the parts in game to see what kind of wobble it gets[/QUOTE]
You've been asked this probably plenty of times but do you know any idea for a release of the ship ? Early Release,Testing etc.

Quote

sorry no stream today

NateDaBeast modeling, texturing, unity'ing, cfg'ing... the usual stuff

njmksr I'm not sure, I'd have to test the parts in game to see what kind of wobble it gets


Ok. Thanks!

Edited December 2, 2015 by njmksr

pics :)))

[imgur]T0635[/imgur]

textures wip


[B]njmksr[/B] The ship has no shake with KJR. Havent tried it without KJR yet, and docked together.

[quote name='xxhansonmaxx']pics :)))

[URL]http://imgur.com/a/T0635[/URL]

textures wip


[B]njmksr[/B] The ship has no shake with KJR. Havent tried it without KJR yet, and docked together.[/QUOTE]
Looks amazing !

So you only have to do the back I imagine then it can release ?
Have you thought of also replicating the Ascent Stage of the MAV with the ladder coming in from the bottom between the nozzles ? Thanks. :)

New forum!

Finished texturing the Engine during the weekend
Awesome. I like the darker tint used here. Very barebones, so very nice.

Looks awesome, the style is fitting both stock KSP and The Martian.
I'd add some thick cables covered in micrometeoroid protection wrappings in those thin areas with girder-like reinforcements. I remember someone mentioning replacement cable in the book.  It'll also fir stock well - remember those cables on ion engine?
I really hope this comes out quickly, I'm so excited, the wait feels like a century.
Just think what the martian felt, waiting all that time.
Man that looks good. Awesome texturing!
